mods.note: - ® MAP No. Ill FOR OFFICIAL USE ONLY.

location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘Map No. III. Sketch Map of Shaiba Defences’

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:408 x 326 mm, on sheet 484 x 474 mm

mods.abstract: Imprint:General Staff India. S.D.O. No. 1251, June, 1915.Distinctive Features:Title continues: ‘Submitted with General Mellis’s report’.Map of Shaiba and vicinity produced to illustrate the positions of British and Turkish military forces showing the location of various brigades and headquarters with fire, support and reserve trenches indicated by symbols and explained in a key at the upper right-hand corner.Bottom right hand corner: ‘(Sd.) E.G. Dunn, Captain, Brigade Major, Shaiba Garrison’.Marked ‘For Official Use Only’.Same base map as IOR/L/MIL/17/15/95, p 45.
